title: Special Case Investigation Team - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Mystery   Psychological   Romance   Shounen Ai
tags: Absent Parents   Anti-social Protagonist   Character Growth   Couple Growth   Crime   Criminals   Detectives   Doting Love Interests   Gore   Handsome Male Lead   Investigations   Manly Gay Couple   Modern Day   Mystery Solving   Police   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reversible Couple   Smart Couple
author: Yi Rong Shu Jiu   易容术九
description:
Cheng Jin: He is good at observing people’s behavior and analyzing it, and ultimately achieving the goal of solving cases- it can be regarded as psychoanalysis*

Yang Simo: He has emotional defects and antisocial personality disorder.
_

*Psychoanalysis: a system of psychological theory and therapy which aims to treat mental disorders by investigating the interaction of conscious and unconscious elements in the mind and bringing repressed fears and conflicts into the conscious mind by techniques such as dream interpretation and free association.>
